column4: Hey guys. I have a compiz cube. I was wondering...how do I set a different wallpaper for each side of the cube?
Hey guys. I have a compiz cube. I was wondering...how do I set a different wallpaper for each side of the cube? Please help!
you need to patch nautilus to do that, afaik
you're going to have to find them yourself, that isn't something covered by this channel
